attributes.action: Bring back the death sentence for convicted murder
attributes.additional_details:
In light of recent events talk of the death sentence has come up again and its time that it was acted upon.
 All cases of murder be it service personal, child murder and attempted murder in terrorism charges, life sentances shouldn't be considered and the death sentence should be the only viable option.
The death sentence needs to be reinstated in those cases.
We as taxpayers and as a country should not pay to keep murderers secure for x amount of years.
